description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using the LightningJS framework, with state management and input handling.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a button with toggleable favorite state.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's state with 'isFavorited', 'favoriteText', and 'unfavoriteText'.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input event to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.
